response.overview: In May 1985 this VHS containing the third installment of the Little Mermaids series was released, with the totally Anglophone title Punky Funky Baby. This third episode differs from the other two seen previously because there is no longer a single protagonist, but this time we have two heroines who go around getting up to all kinds of mischief. We are on a planet the edge of deep space where humans and aliens coexist peacefully. Some areas, however, cannot be crossed as they are home to aliens not too agreeable to quiet living with humans. Two young girls being chased by a couple of thugs end up in the middle of it and there will be trouble.You have to go to certain areas or else there will be trouble.
response.title: PUNKY FUNKY BABY
